summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley in Block 5, Norris' Addition to West Seattle, being the alley between Fauntleroy Avenue and 38th Avenue Southwest from West Edmunds Street to West Hudson Street; and certain other streets and avenues; by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 16747 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
